channel.title: CraftDemon Server
channel.description:
Hello everyone!
First..... Let me me start by saying I have just started playing minecraft and so far I am loving it!
Second..... With the help of my brother and a few other people i have been able to make my own server!
Since i am still kinda new to all this, The server does not have much i can however tell you what the server does have.
My Server Features are as follows.
Server Version craftbukkit-1.1-b4 AEco-2.0 Economy system! Block Protection = Blocks placed by you can only be destroyed by you! LoginRewards = $100.00 for everyday you log in! NoEntityGrief Rakamak = Register System.
!!!Recently Added Features!!!
Factions (Requested.) Chest Lock (Also able to lock Doors, Furnaces, Dispensers as well as Chests.) Multi-World (Currently our server only has 4 World to play on Normal, Nether, End and World2(flat lands.).) Jobs (Now users on the server can earn money for doing what they do best pick from a variety of different jobs while there still available. I will add more slots when slots are needed.)
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
This Server is a Cracked Server so anyone can join! Premium and non-premium are welcome.
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
So please come check out my server. Constructive criticism is appreciated anything to make my server better would be great.
Server IP. craftdemon.sytes.net
Hope to see you in game and thanks for viewing.

item.title: CraftDemon Server
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

afaik I wasnt banned Ileft, I’ll just assume I am now. And I didnt play for a month either, it was two weeks, Or did you include the week your server was shutdown because of your vacation? You can act clever all you want, truth remains you have no idea what you’re doing and there’s still the op abusing dickwad called your little brother.

Read full topic

item.title: CraftDemon Server
item.dc:creator: @smcintyre712 smcintyre712
item.description:
@smcintyre712 wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:7, topic:433951”]This server is truly awefull. The host doesnt have a clue of what hes doing.
Power abusing mods, and more staff than actual players.The amount of bugs they have are bad enough if not for the fact that its being hosted on an out of date home PC in some guys bedroom.[/quote]
Correct me if im wrong but werent you playing on this outta date server for about a month straight till you got banned?
Is that why your bashing my server are you bitter you got banned?
Aww dont cry im sure there are other aweful servers being hosted on outta date PC ran outta some other guys bedroom you can join for the time being cause your to lazy to create host and maintain your own.
Its kool we still love you DB.

Read full topic

item.title: CraftDemon Server
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

new problem, the server is saying i don’t have any permissions to do anything so i cant make a shop, use /ft, use /help, use /spawn, or anything, plus it doesn’t seem to recognize me as a farmer, it says im “none triston001” however i have reached level 3 farmer, and it hasn’t given me the login reward even tho i logged in daily the past 2 days

item.title: CraftDemon Server
item.dc:creator: @smcintyre712 smcintyre712
item.description:
@smcintyre712 wrote:

Hello everyone!

First… Let me me start by saying I have just started playing minecraft and so far I am loving it!

Second… With the help of my brother and a few other people i have been able to make my own server!

Since i am still kinda new to all this, The server does not have much i can however tell you what the server does have.

My Server Features are as follows.

Server Version craftbukkit-1.1-b4
AEco-2.0 Economy system!
Block Protection = Blocks placed by you can only be destroyed by you!
LoginRewards = $100.00 for everyday you log in!
NoEntityGrief
Rakamak = Register System.

!!!Recently Added Features!!!

Factions (Requested.)
Chest Lock (Also able to lock Doors, Furnaces, Dispensers as well as Chests.)
Multi-World (Currently our server only has 4 World to play on Normal, Nether, End and World2(flat lands.).)
Jobs (Now users on the server can earn money for doing what they do best pick from a variety of different jobs while there still available. I will add more slots when slots are needed.)

!!!

This Server is a Cracked Server so anyone can join!
Premium and non-premium are welcome.

!!!

So please come check out my server. Constructive criticism is appreciated anything to make my server better would be great.

Server IP.
craftdemon.sytes.net

Hope to see you in game and thanks for viewing.
